channel.title: PI help
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HuFrk.png[/img]
How do I make those invisible skill icons display proper levels like 1/99?
I spent about 4 days trying to fix this and came up with no proper solution. can someone either TV it or explain to me what I should do?

item.description:

Can you help me with MSN?

Also: how would I make it so it shows it when immediately when I login instead of just dying?

item.title: PI help
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Code kai, post:3, topic:443776”][quote author=mr extremez link=topic=546454.msg4006107#msg4006107 date=1338657025]
http://www.rune-serber.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/333740-602-skilltab-server-side.html

Maybe this?
[/quote]

It didn’t work. By the way, the skills only show up when I die… I believe this is server sided. How would I fix this?[/quote]Well when you die it is handled in playerassistant.java in the applydead method you should check there.

Read full topic
